client.ClientViews

Class GUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.ClientViews.GUIController

  • class GUIController
extends java.lang.Object
    GUI controller manages the GUI. Client-server interaction is prompted by events.
    Since:
    April 5, 2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jake Liu, Shamez Meghji, Victor Sanchez

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GUIController.AddItem
      Inner ActionListener class listens for the "Add Item" button to be pressed, whereupon error checking is done and an item is added to the store.
      class  GUIController.AddSupplier
      Inner ActionListener class listens for the "Add Supplier" button to be pressed, whereupon user input is taken to add a supplier, and the supplier list is updated.
      class  GUIController.ImportItems
      Inner ActionListener class listens for the "Import Items" button to be pressed, whereupon a prompt to import a file of items will appear.
      class  GUIController.ImportSuppliers
      Inner ActionListener class listens for the "Import Suppliers" button to be pressed, whereupon a prompt to import a file of suppliers will appear.
      class  GUIController.Refresh
      Inner ActionListener class listens for the "Refresh" button to be pressed, whereupon a the displays are updated and a loading circle is shown.
      class  GUIController.searchItem
      Inner DocumentListener class updates the item list displayed to only have names containing what the user searches.
      class  GUIController.SelectItem
      inner ListSelectionListener class handles objects that have been selected by the user.
      class  GUIController.ViewOrders
      Inner ActionListener class listens for the "View Orders" button to be pressed, whereupon the order window will be made visible.
      class  GUIController.ViewSuppliers
      Inner ActionListener class listens for the "View Suppliers" button to be pressed, whereupon the supplier window will be made visible.
      class  GUIController.WindowClose
      Inner ActionListener class listens for main window events, mainly when the window is closed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ClientController cc
      Client to communicate with the server.
      private MainView mv
      Main view is always seen.
      private OrderView ov
      Order list view.
      private SupplierView sv
      Supplier list view.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUIController

        protected GUIController(ClientController controller)
        Constructor, using a given client. Creates the views of the GUI.
        Parameters:
        controller - The client controller to communicate to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • setUpCC

        protected void setUpCC()
        Sends display areas to the client controller for its use.

      • addActionListeners

        protected void addActionListeners()
        Assigns all action listeners for buttons on the front end.

      • retrieveAndDisplayItems

        protected void retrieveAndDisplayItems()
        Retrieves and displays item data from server. Displays and error box to the user if this is unsuccessful.

      • retrieveAndDisplaySuppliers

        protected void retrieveAndDisplaySuppliers()
        Retrieves and displays supplier data from server. Displays and error box to the user if this is unsuccessful.

      • retrieveAndDisplayOrders

        protected void retrieveAndDisplayOrders()
        Retrieves and displays order data from server. Displays and error box to the user if this is unsuccessful.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method for the program. Creates the GUI. Also creates and runs a client, which tries to connect to a game server on port 8428.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments when starting the program.
